statements: REVOKE SELECT, INSERT, UPDATE, DELETE ON logistics.shipments FROM user1;
REVOKE SELECT, INSERT ON logistics.shipments FROM user2;
REVOKE ALL PRIVILEGES ON logistics.shipments FROM user3;
REVOKE SELECT ON shipments FROM user1
REVOKE INSERT, UPDATE ON products FROM user2
REVOKE ALL PRIVILEGES ON shipments, products FROM user3
REVOKE SELECT ON shipments TO public;
REVOKE INSERT, UPDATE ON products TO role1;
REVOKE DELETE, UPDATE ON warehouses TO role2;
REVOKE INSERT ON warehouse FROM public
REVOKE INSERT, DELETE ON employee FROM public
REVOKE ALL PRIVILEGES ON shipment FROM public
REVOKE SELECT ON Customers FROM PUBLIC;
REVOKE INSERT ON Orders FROM PUBLIC;
REVOKE UPDATE ON Products FROM PUBLIC;
